ValidationRule.description: Validate the new data model for table actions
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
/* Only apply it to the new datamodel */ CONTAINS(LOWER(TEXT(Type__c)), 'table') && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(TEXT(Type__c)), 'primary')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(TEXT(Type__c)), 'secondary')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(TEXT(Type__c)), 'overflow')) &&
/* For some reason, converting to text works better for this */ TEXT( Order__c ) != '1' && TEXT( Order__c ) != '2'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Required for Table actions. Must be 1 or 2
